Text: This is some good shit. Thanks!
Great CD, be sure to buy it when it's released, well worth the money to get a real copy!

This is one album I'll pass on in the p2p version, and instead wait for the release. Getting an Ayreon album is like getting a new vinyl back in the 80s. Sliding the disc out, looking at the cover, ahhh... Thanks for sharing this, though. It's always great to share good music :)
